title: Recording Academy Set to Open Grammy House in Egypt, First Location Outside the U.S.
summary: The Giza-set event will feature live performances, cultural exchanges, educational panels and collaborative sessions.
body: The Recording Academy’s immersive pop-up experience, Grammy House, will expand globally in 2026 with the launch of Grammy House Giza in Egypt. Previous Grammy House activations have occurred in Los Angeles and New York.  Related Recording Academy’s Grammy House Returns With Halle Bailey Masterclass & More Recording Academy Details Global Expansion Efforts in Africa and the Middle East Recording Academy Elevates Adam Roth to EVP of Global Partnerships & Business Development Grammy House Giza will unite artists, producers, songwriters and industry leaders from around the world for several days of programming in October 2026. The event will feature live performances, cultural exchanges, educational panels and collaborative sessions. “It is a thrill to expand the Grammy House experience globally, and to see it come to life at one of the world’s most iconic locations,” Harvey Mason jr , CEO of the Recording Academy, said in a statement. “Grammy House Giza represents the spirit of the Recording Academy’s vision to amplify music people worldwide and create meaningful gathering places for our entire music community. Next year’s event will be a beacon of collabo…

title: Savory Croissants Are Going Way Beyond Ham and Cheese
summary: The Houston bakery Shakkar serves croissants that are basically meals, like a steak frites croissant | Photo by Maham Qureshi For me, the light bulb moment was the steak frites croissant. I was scrolling Instagram when the golden brown pastry popped onto my phone screen, a hunk of steak poking out …
